name: Monster Chase (FNC_PRIME)
description:
This is my first game.

How to Play:

1.Unzip the .rar file.

2.then run the ,exe file.(Monster Chase.exe)

3.When you open the game, you will see unity logo wait for a second.

4.You will be directed to the Main Menu of the Game.

5.You will 2 buttons with the image of the two character.

6.Select one of the characters.

7.You will be directed to the main game with your selected charcter.

8.Use arrow keys to move left & right.

9.Use Space Bar to jump.

10.You Can Restart the Game if you die by clicking the restart button at the top left corner of the screen .

11.If you want to change your character by Going to main menu by clicking the home button

12.You need to jump above the monsters randomly coming from the two sides(right or left).

Thank You !!! Please download my game and comment on my Game.
